title: Ticket #609: add manual documentation of the startd cron functionality
description: There are many documented STARTD_CRON configuration variables. And, there is even a configuration example in the configuration section of the manual. But, there is no actual documentation of this "Hawkeye" functionality. There should be.
remarks:
Info from merged in ticket #970: STARTD_CRON documentation incomplete for streaming jobs.

The documentation for the STARTD_CRON functionality is unclear about how streaming jobs are used, which options require them, and doesn't even mention the need for a "-" record delimiter for them.

Info from merged in ticket #962: STARTD_CRON function disagrees with documentation: ARGS

The documentation fails to mention that the name from the joblist is always passed as the first argument to the EXECUTABLE. 

$ _CONDOR_STARTD_CRON_JOBLIST=TEST _CONDOR_STARTD_CRON_TEST_EXECUTABLE=/bin/echo _CONDOR_STARTD_CRON_TEST_ARGS="A=1" _CONDOR_STARTD_CRON_TEST_PERIOD=5s condor_startd -t -f

Code changes are in many tickets, including #1086, #1837, #1838, and #1698.
